channel.description: It should be clear from our earlier discussion that there are some very real challenges to writing a good authentication approach. These challenges can be broken into two categories, those that face us as the programmer, and those that arise from our users: Programmer Challenges For us as the programmer, there are a lot of steps in creating an authentication strategy that we must get right. We also must be very careful about how we store the authentication data - i.
